quiz.title: What Star Wars Prequil Character Are You?
quiz.description: Take this quiz to find out which Jedi you are most similar to. It's fun, fast, and easy. Try it now!

question.title: Helping a Citizen
question.text: A terrified citizen is about to be beaten and robbed by criminals. He offers to pay you for your help.\n\nWhat do you do?

answer.text: Kill the criminals, save the citizen, and take your reward.
Scare away the criminals and only defend yourself if needed. Refuse any reward.
Kill the criminals, and the citizen, and take all their money.

question.title: Choosing Your Alliances
question.text: Everyone wants you to join their alliance. Who do you choose?

question.title: The Jedi Council
question.text: You have just been appointed to the Jedi Council, but you have NOT been granted the rank of master.\n\nWhat do you do?

answer.text: Accept your place in the council, graciously
Whine and Bellyache about how much you deserve to be granted the rank of master
Give Yoda the bird and quit the Jedi Order

character.title: Obiwan Kenobi
character.description: You are a fearless warrior, full of good, and a champion of justice.

character.title: Count Dooku
character.description: You are ruthless, evil, and greedy. You'll do anything to conquer the galaxy and become even more powerful than your master. If it meant victory, you would even give Annakin a hand ;)

character.title: Anakin Skywalker
character.description: Neither good nor evil, you are volatile and conflicted; Ruthless and ambitious. The future of the galaxy may depend on you.
